lore: All Shapers bear some responsibility for the gradual guidance of their fellows’ genetic makeup through ingestion of selected preg. The Flesh Shapers take this art to a more immediate and visceral extreme through the use of gruesome flesh-fetishes and ritualised butchery whose psychosomatic impact upon the Kroot is remarkable.

otherAbilities.name: Ritual Butchery
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

otherAbilities.name: Rites of Feasting
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability. If that unit destroys one or more enemy units in the Fight phase, until the end of the battle, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability instead.
